alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Northern Craven; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Craven, southeastern Pitt and southwestern Beaufort Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Calico, or 11 miles southeast of Ayden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Washington, River Road, Blounts Creek, Vanceboro, Shelmerdine, Calico, Black Jack, Wilmar, Bunyan, Cox Crossroads, Chocowinity, Washington Park and Gardnerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
